headline: Roper Technologies to present at Wells Fargo technology conference
summary: SARASOTA, Fla., Nov. 26, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Roper Technologies, Inc. (Nasdaq: ROP) announced that it is presenting at the Wells Fargo TMT Summit on Tuesday, December 3, 2024 at 8:45 AM (Pacific Time) in Rancho Palos Verdes, CA. A link to the webcast presentation will be available in the “Investors” section of the Company’s website at www.ropertech.com.
